ygData.subject: Re: Will my account still be good?
ygData.msgSnippet: We have not had the what s the best server question for awhile here. I now play almost exclusively on Xev. Xev is one of the newest non-pvp, non
ygData.messageBody:
We have not had the "what's the best server"
question for awhile here. <br><br>I now play almost
exclusively on Xev. Xev is one of the newest non-pvp, non
specialty (UK or role play perferred) servers. It is still
nearly a year and a half old, though, and is becoming
more like the other servers-- crowded at times, fights
for camp spots, lots of uber twinkage. BUT the
population still seems to be lower than most, and I still
group with a lot of new players when I play my alts.
<br><br>I abondoned all other servers a year ago, with the
exception of:<br><br>Sullon Zek-- still gotta get my PVP on
every once in a while. Yes, Ogre shammies can Kite.
<br><br>Firiona Vie-- Very fun server with a tight knit community
of mostly roll-players. Rule set is sometimes a
hindrance, but can also be fun-- nothing is No Drop, so lots
of good trading for stuff you wouldn't normally
find. Also, there next to no twinkage, because you can
only have 1 char-- so people marvel at me for being in
full banded-- haha<br><br>Your thoughts??
